Class Obstacle

    public class Obstacle
extends java.lang.Object

    The class of the planes that are obstacles in the simulation represented with lines

                double y,
                double theta,

        Creates a new line with the values entered in the parameters
        Parameters:
        x - The first x value of the line
        y - The first y value of the line
        theta - The angle of the obstacle
        length - The length of the obstacle
